  1. Mahakali
  2. Kosi
  3. Gandak
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: India has agreements with Nepal for 3 rivers viz. Mahakali, Kosi and Gandak. For Mahakali the treaty was signed in 1996, it includes Pancheshwar Multi-purpose project. For Kosi, the agreement was signed in 1954 and was revised in 1966. This includes the construction of Kosi Barrage in Nepal. For Gandak river, the agreement was signed in 1959 and includes construction of Gandak Barrage in Nepal.
